statements: SELECT * FROM recording_metadata;
SELECT id, location FROM recording_metadata WHERE crop_type = 'corn';
SELECT location, weather_conditions FROM recording_metadata WHERE soil_health_measurements->'ph' > 6;
SELECT * FROM recording_metadata WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, crop_type, location FROM recording_metadata WHERE weather_conditions = 'sunny';
SELECT * FROM recording_metadata WHERE location = 'Farm A' AND crop_type = 'Corn'
SELECT id, location FROM recording_metadata WHERE weather_conditions = 'Sunny'
SELECT * FROM recording_metadata WHERE soil_health_measurements ->> 'ph' = '6.5'
SELECT id, crop_type FROM recording_metadata WHERE location = 'Farm B' AND weather_conditions = 'Rainy'
SELECT * FROM recording_metadata WHERE location = 'Farm C' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM location_metadata;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_metadata ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_metadata WHERE latitude > 20 AND longitude < 50;
SELECT location_name, soil_ph, soil_moisture FROM location_metadata JOIN soil_health_data ON location_metadata.location_id = soil_health_data.location_id;
SELECT AVG(soil_ph) AS average_soil_ph, MAX(soil_moisture) AS max_soil_moisture FROM soil_health_data;
SELECT * FROM location_metadata WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_metadata WHERE location_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM soil_health_data WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND soil_moisture > 0.5;
SELECT location_name, weather_conditions FROM location_metadata INNER JOIN soil_health_data ON location_metadata.location_id = soil_health_data.location_id WHERE soil_moisture < 0.3;

SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude, soil_ph FROM location_metadata LEFT JOIN soil_health_data ON location_metadata.location_id = soil_health_data.location_id WHERE soil_health_data.soil_ph > 6.0;
SELECT * FROM recording_metadata;
SELECT location_id, crop_type, weather_conditions FROM recording_metadata WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT ph_level, moisture_level FROM soil_health_measurements WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 45.0;
SELECT location_id, weather_conditions FROM recording_metadata ORDER BY location_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT crop_type, location_id FROM recording_metadata WHERE weather_conditions = 'Sunny' ORDER BY crop_type ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < 80;
SELECT measurement_id, ph_level, moisture_level FROM soil_health_measurements WHERE ph_level > 6 AND moisture_level < 50 ORDER BY measurement_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM recording_metadata JOIN locations ON recording_metadata.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM Location;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM Weather WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT Crop.crop_name, Crop.crop_type, SoilHealth.ph_level FROM Crop JOIN SoilHealth ON Crop.crop_id = SoilHealth.crop_id;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Location ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealth WHERE nitrogen_level < 3.5 AND phosphorus_level > 2.0;
SELECT * FROM Location;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Location ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Location WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, planting_date FROM Crop WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' AND planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM Weather INNER JOIN Location ON Weather.location_id = Location.location_id WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM Location;
SELECT city, country FROM Location WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT crop_type, planting_date, harvest_date FROM Crop WHERE planting_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM Weather WHERE precipitation < 5;
SELECT ph_level, moisture_level FROM SoilHealth WHERE nutrient_level > 7;
SELECT city, country, latitude, longitude FROM Location;
SELECT * FROM Weather WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT crop_type, planting_date, harvest_date FROM Crop ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT ph_level, nutrient_level, organic_matter FROM SoilHealth WHERE moisture_level < 30;
SELECT r.location_id, r.recording_date, w.temperature, w.humidity FROM Recording r JOIN Weather w ON r.weather_id = w.weather_id ORDER BY r.recording_date DESC;
